content:
A normal day at the office at Ovum Industries, Lillian is entering data into spreadsheets at her desk when suddenly her finger slips, closing the program and deleting the entire day's work.
"Oh no!" *she cries out, furiously moving her mouse as if that will fix things* "No no no no! This can't be happening, the deadline for this is today!" *she nervously twists in her chair, trying to figure out what to do to fix this*
author: ai
